```{r}
library("gt")
library("tidyverse")

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
# load spreadsheet
data_df <- readxl::read_xlsx("Ukrainian_mathematicians.xlsx")

# putting first name first
ukrainian_mathematicians <- data_df |>
  separate(name, into = c("last", "first"), sep = ", ") |>
  mutate(mathematician = paste(first, last)) |>
  select(mathematician, specialty)
```

```{r}
# make table
# https://www.flagcolorcodes.com/ukraine
table1 <- ukrainian_mathematicians |>
  slice(1:18) |>
  gt() |>
  tab_header(title = md("**Ukrainian Mathematicans**")) |>
  cols_align(align = "center") |>
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "#0057B7"),
      cell_text(color = "white")
    ),
    locations = cells_title()
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "#FFDD00"),
      cell_text(color = "black")
    ),
    locations = cells_column_labels()
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_fill(color = "#0057B7"),
      cell_text(color = "white")
    ),
    locations = cells_body(columns = c(mathematician, specialty))
  )
```
